Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a brown-pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394141) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394141)
